title: Graph of deriv.: 4 segments part - a

content.question: Find the x-coordinate of all points of inflection of the graph of y = g(x) for -3 < x < 7. Justify your answer.

frqParts.text: Find the x-coordinate of all points of inflection of the graph of y = g(x) for -3 < x < 7. Justify your answer.

topic.text: 5.3: Determining Intervals on Which a Function Is Increasing or Decreasing

skill.text: Skill 2.E: Describe the relationships among different representations of functions and their derivatives.
